card_text: You can activate 1 of these effects, but you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Dragunity" monsters.$N●Target 1 "Dragunity" Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone; Special Summon it in Defense Position.$N●Target 1 "Dragunity" monster you control; equip that target with 1 "Dragunity" monster from your GY.$NYou can only use this effect of "Dragunity Legion" once per turn.
